item.title: Testing and designing quantum algorithms for the NISQ era
item.description:
Based on the references:

  • “Exact Ising model simulation on a quantum computer”, A. Cervera-Lierta,
    Quantum 2, 114 (2018).
  • Tequila repository.
  • “Quantum computer-aided design: digital quantum simulation of quantum processors”, Thi Ha Kyaw, Tim Menke, Sukin Sim, Nicolas P. D. Sawaya, William D. Oliver, Gian Giacomo Guerreschi, Alán Aspuru-Guzik, arxiv:2006.03070 [quant-ph]
  • “Quantum Computer-Aided design of Quantum Optics Hardware”, Jakob S. Kottmann, Mario Krenn, Thi Ha Kyaw, Sumner Alperin-Lea, Alán Aspuru-Guzik, arXiv:2006.03075 [quant-ph]
  • “The Meta-Variational Quantum Eigensolver (Meta-VQE): Learning energy profiles of parameterized Hamiltonians for quantum simulation”, Alba Cervera-Lierta, Jakob S. Kottmann, Alán Aspuru-Guzik arXiv:2009.13545 [quant-ph]

item.title: Maximal Entanglement in Quantum Computation
item.description:
Based on the references:

  • “Exact Ising model simulation on a quantum computer”, A. Cervera-Lierta,

    Phys. Rev. A 100, 022342 (2019).

item.title: Maximal Entanglement. Applications to Quantum Computation and Particle Physics
